function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Balconies are commonly used as spaces for food production and processing.","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and spread of foodborne diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement proper hygiene practices and food safety guidelines for balcony food production.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Residents using balconies for food production and processing","Owner":"Homeowners' associations, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Balconies are important places for natural processing of food, which can pose health risks if not properly managed.","Impact":"Potential exposure to foodborne pathogens and toxins.","Mitigation":"Enforce regulations and guidelines for safe food processing on balconies.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Residents using balconies for food processing","Owner":"Local health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Increased use of balconies during the pandemic may lead to higher potential for contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases in close proximity to other residents.","Mitigation":"Promote ventilation and air circulation on balconies, and encourage use of personal protective equipment when interacting with neighbors.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, personal protective equipment","People":"Residents using balconies, neighbors in close proximity","Owner":"Homeowners' associations, local authorities"}]}
